channel.title: What to write about for teen dropout draft?
channel.description:
Well I need to have this draft done by tomorrow, I didn't have much time for anything until now which leaves me with.... 7 hours until school. Yeah I know im late, but I really need this grade to pass :|. I need at least 3 paragraphs [*] The overall introduction [+]Teen [*] The detailed body of the introduction [*] And the conclusion What I got so far:
[center][b] [size=14pt]TEEN DROPOUT[/size] [size=10pt]by Jarod Billingslea[/size] [/b][/center] It cannot always be ascertained that a student has dropped out, as he or she may stop attending their school without terminating enrollment. Reasons are varied and may include: to find work, avoid bullying, family emergency, poor grades, unexpected pregnancy, bad environment, lack of freedom, and boredom from lack of lessons relevant to the world of work.

item.title: What to write about for teen dropout draft?
item.dc:creator: @Server-Unknown.Net Server-Unknown.Net
item.description:
@Server-Unknown.Net wrote:

Well I need to have this draft done by tomorrow, I didn’t have much time for anything until now which leaves me with… 7 hours until school. Yeah I know im late, but I really need this grade to pass :|.

I need at least 3 paragraphs
[] The overall introduction
[+]Teen
[] The detailed body of the introduction
[*] And the conclusion

What I got so far:

[center][b] [size=14pt]TEEN DROPOUT[/size] [size=10pt]by Jarod Billingslea[/size] [/b][/center]

It cannot always be ascertained that a student has dropped out, as he or she may stop attending their school without terminating enrollment. Reasons are varied and may include: to find work, avoid bullying, family emergency, poor grades, unexpected pregnancy, bad environment, lack of freedom, and boredom from lack of lessons relevant to the world of work.
